Anchor at $1,800 — well above my estimate but below initial $2,200 — signaling willingness to negotiate while protecting value.

I can do $1,800 and I’ll include a recent service receipt and a pair of clipless pedals so you can ride away immediately. I’m available for a test ride or to meet this week if that helps. If that’s out of range, let me know your best next offer.
